statements: SELECT * FROM seasonal_products;
SELECT product_name, season FROM seasonal_products WHERE previous_sales_data > 500;
SELECT product_id, product_name, season FROM seasonal_products WHERE demand_forecast <= 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, season, demand_forecast FROM seasonal_products WHERE season = 'Summer';
SELECT product_id, product_name, season FROM seasonal_products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, season, demand_forecast FROM seasonal_products WHERE season = 'Summer' ORDER BY demand_forecast DESC;
SELECT * FROM seasonal_products WHERE previous_sales_data > 1000 AND season = 'Winter';
SELECT product_id, product_name, season, SUM(demand_forecast) AS total_demand FROM seasonal_products GROUP BY season ORDER BY total_demand DESC;
SELECT product_name, season, previous_sales_data, demand_forecast FROM seasonal_products WHERE season IN ('Spring', 'Fall') ORDER BY previous_sales_data ASC;
SELECT product_name, season, demand_forecast FROM seasonal_products WHERE demand_forecast BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY demand_forecast DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT id, product_name, sales_date, quantity FROM Sales;
SELECT * FROM DemandForecast WHERE forecasted_quantity > 100;
SELECT sales_date, quantity, product_name FROM Sales ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, sales_date FROM Sales WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, forecast_date, forecasted_quantity FROM DemandForecast WHERE forecasted_quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY sales_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_sales FROM Sales GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_sales > 500 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;

SELECT s.product_name, d.forecasted_quantity FROM Sales s INNER JOIN DemandForecast d ON s.product_name = d.product_name WHERE s.sales_date > '2021-01-01' AND d.forecast_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY d.forecasted_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, sales_date FROM Sales WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND sales_date >= '2021-03-01' ORDER BY sales_date ASC;

SELECT s.product_name, COUNT(*) AS num_forecasts FROM Sales s LEFT JOIN DemandForecast d ON s.product_name = d.product_name WHERE d.forecasted_quantity IS NOT NULL GROUP BY s.product_name HAVING num_forecasts > 2 ORDER BY num_forecasts DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, category, forecasted_demand FROM products;
SELECT product_name, season FROM products WHERE forecasted_demand > 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, forecasted_demand FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, forecasted_demand FROM products;
SELECT product_name, sale_date, units_sold, revenue FROM products INNER JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id;
SELECT product_name, forecast_date, forecasted_demand FROM products INNER JOIN forecasts ON products.product_id = forecasts.product_id;
SELECT product_name, category, season FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_name, forecasted_demand FROM products WHERE forecasted_demand > 100 ORDER BY forecasted_demand DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, unit_price, category FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, units_sold FROM sales_data WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT season_name, start_date, end_date FROM seasons WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT sale_date, units_sold, revenue FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT season_name, start_date, end_date FROM seasons WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, unit_price, category FROM products WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, SUM(units_sold) AS total_units_sold FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id, product_name;
SELECT * FROM ProductForecast
SELECT product_name, forecast_value FROM ProductForecast WHERE season='Summer'
SELECT product_name, season, forecast_value FROM ProductForecast ORDER BY forecast_value DESC
SELECT product_name, forecast_value FROM ProductForecast WHERE forecast_value > 1000
SELECT product_name, season, forecast_value FROM ProductForecast WHERE season='Winter'
SELECT product_name, season, forecast_value FROM ProductForecast WHERE product_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM SalesHistory ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, season, forecast_value FROM ProductForecast WHERE season IN ('Summer', 'Fall');
SELECT season_name, average_sales FROM SeasonalTrends WHERE average_sales > 1000 ORDER BY average_sales DESC;
SELECT product_id, stock_quantity, last_stock_update FROM ProductInventory WHERE stock_quantity < 50;
